attributes.action: I want a review of the Pensions Process
attributes.additional_details: I want the DWP to address the unfairness of the Pensions in the UK. You are penalised for working all your life
attributes.background: I want a review of the Pensions system and fair play put in place for the thousands of British workers being ripped off.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about pensions, but we're not sure exactly what aspects of the pension process you'd like the Government or Parliament to review, or what unfairness you are concerned about.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
